reviewText: Oh memories. I loved this movie as a kid. Sad I couldn't find it on dvd. But with the converters out now. Shouldnt be an issue. Cant wait to share it with my son!
I used to watch this movie a lot when I was kid. So, when I saw it I had to buy it. Its a cute family movie as well.

I'm not going to lie to you, I've always had a reputation as a great actor, but I outdid myself in this picture. What didn't I do in this flick. I finally exposed Tom Wopat for the hack he is. I showed a range of emotions, the ability to be an action hero and a side that appeals to the ladies. The production company told me there would be no sequel because america was too emotionally taxed by this film. I can't say I blame them. This thing is ET without aliens and shrewd product placement. Do youself a favor and rent it because I'm one brilliant talking bear.
